column5: I have a party of 12 going to Lake Ogascanan in August this year, any suggestions on bait and techniques there at that time of year? thanks---

Here's a couple of trip reports from visits to Ogascanan in 2009. You might try sending a private message to each guy if you would like more information.http://www.kipawa.net/viewtopic.php?t=1405&highlight=http://www.kipawa.net/viewtopic.php?t=1432&highlight=
thank you for your help sir!!!!
